title: Need help with my client/launcher. It keeps asking me permission to update my shortcuts
body:
My client/launcher recently started prompting me for permission to update my shortcuts every time I login. (maybe 2 weeks ago)

When I click OK, it requests administrator rights and if I click yes, nothing happens (shortcuts stay the same). If I click no instead, League just closes and I have to go through the same process again.

Can somebody help me out of this? It's starting to get really annoying to have to go through this every time I login to play (or every time I switch accounts)


Thank you very much :)

replies.body:
The Client just kicked me out of a game to activate the self-repair function then put me back into the game (as level 1 vs opponent mid laner being level 5) when it was done repairing.

After the game, I checked to see if the shortcut shenanigans had stopped, but they didn't.

It even linked me to [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005665088-Installing-the-updated-League-client#h2) and I went through those steps, hoping it would fix it. After backing up my Config folder into a .rar (wouldn't want to lose all my settings for no reason, so I kept a backup in case deleting it didn't fix anything I could restore it) I tried their steps...... aaaaand we're still on square 1.

Guess I'll have to give the Hextech Repair Tool a try, but isn't that the same Repair Tool that my client just ran automatically when it detected "errors in my installation" ?


PS: Been playing since Season 3, never had a single bug with my Client, this all started a few weeks ago (pre-season patch I think or the one before) for no apparent reason. Oh, actually, now that I think of it, I think it coincides with the installation of the PBE client/shortcuts, maybe those two are conflicting for some reason? I installed them in two different folders and the shortcuts have different names though. I don't even have desktop shortcuts anymore (deleted them all hoping that would solve my issue) and I tried removing my Start menu shortcuts but that didn't fix it either.


Pls Send ~~Nudes~~ Halp :^)

Some setting or antivirus is still blocking your game files from updating properly.  Try out each step in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception and get this fixed up.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zqeu1YhO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-01T17:15:29.703+0000)
>
> Some setting or antivirus is still blocking your game files from updating properly.  Try out each step in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception and get this fixed up.

I updated my Windows, disabled my UAC, ran the game as administrator and scanned my C: drive for errors.

I really don't feel like re-installing the game though, especially since it's an issue that only came up in the recent patches and I'm hoping it will go away eventually.

Is there anything else I can do? I even deleted my desktop shortcuts hoping that would solve it but it didn't work.

The [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help make repairing and reinstalling much easier.  Give that a go, and if the issue exists let me know.  I'll be happy to create a support ticket for you.
